snippet: President Obama declared he was confident the Supreme Court would uphold the legislation, saying it would be an “unprecedented, extraordinary” step to overturn it.
abstract: Pres Obama declares that he is confident that the Supreme Court will uphold his health care law, saying it would be an unprecedented, extraordinary step to overturn the legislation.
lead_paragraph: President Obama declared he was confident the Supreme Court would uphold the legislation, saying it would be an “unprecedented, extraordinary” step to overturn it.

headline.seo: Obama Says He’s Confident Health Care Law Will Stand
headline.main: President Confident Health Law Will Stand
headline.print_headline: President Confident Health Law Will Stand

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
